text: Jisas anɨb agɨl kɨlop agak, Yad nepin, binɨb mɨñɨl ñɨn awl mɨdebal okok, ñapay sɨkol ogɨnap tek mɨdebal agak. Ñapay sɨkol okok, kɨli sɨlpɨŋ ñɨlɨg ogɨnap apal, Dachɨŋ pakon, taynen kɨgom ma papɨm apal agak? Pen kɨmep chɨb gek tek agon, taynen chaŋ ma lɨpɨm apal agak? Gɨpal tek ak binɨb mɨñɨl mɨdebal okok kɨli gɨpal agak.
